0 A.D. is a free and open-source, historical Real Time Strategy game, focused on the period from 500 B.C. to 1 B.C., under development by Wildfire Games. It's cross-platform, playable on Windows, macOS, FreeBSD, Linux, and OpenBSD. Choose from 13 different civilizations, a multitude of maps, game modes, single player or multiplayer.

Artist in Nova Scotia making Nova Scotian Art. I post pictures mostly. All of my digital art is digital. I don't expect automatic followbacks, if pictures aren't your thing. I am mostly here for reliable medical/health news.

Professor (Em.) of Medieval Archaeology, University of Cambridge. Interested in the origins of early #medieval English society; rights of #common; #landscape #archaeology & #history c400-1200. Research & publications at https://profsusanoosthuizen.wordpress.com

I am a retired web developer with an interest in political and environmental issues in Canada, but with a focus on Alberta, since this is where I live. I have an interest in music, Linux, and play guitar and piano a little bit. Sometimes I try my hand at cooking. My kids are all grown up, and I have three grand-children.
